texto: hosting the software system and handling communications with other systems can also be viewed as enabling systems or external systems in the operating environment. The perception and definition of a particular software system, its architecture, and its elements depend on a stakeholder’s interests and responsibilities. One stakeholder’s system‐of‐interest can be viewed as a system element in another stakeholder’s system‐of‐interest. Furthermore, a system‐of‐interest can be viewed as being part of the environment for another stakeholder’s system‐of‐interest.
